Entries.movieTheater: @, have you heard? We've got a movie theater now! Think I'll take Caroline out on a date...
Entries.winter_7{{YearRemainder}}: Gotta start stocking Winter Star gifts soon. It's the busiest retail season of the year...$h
Entries.Resort_Chair: Ah, a chance to rest my feet!$h

Entries.Thu6: I wish Abigail was more serious about her studies.$s
Entries.summer_Thu6: My, isn't it a hot day today! Wish we stocked more ice cream, that'd sell like crazy on a day like this.
Entries.summer_Fri6: It's Friday, @! Looking forward to the weekend?#$b#Me? Of course I am, I get the most customers on weekends.$h
Entries.1_2: I wish Abby had more ambition in her life.$s
Entries.6_2: My father? He really wasn't ever in my life.$s#$b#It was just me, my mother, and my sister, in a tiny apartment in Zuzu City.
Entries.8_2: I worked for a Joja grocery store, back when we lived in Zuzu.#$b#Clerked for them, on the night shift. Am so glad I no longer have that job.#$e#Managing this store is hard work but at least I get to keep all my earnings.
Entries.11_2: Harvey says I've gotta do something about my blood pressure, it keeps creeping up way too high.#$e#He thinks I should start taking medication for it, but I don't want to.
Entries.17_2: I grew up poor. I wouldn't ever want that for my family.$s#$b#Caroline thinks I work too much, but we need to keep the store running.$s
Entries.19_2: We used to have a lot more farmers down in the valley. Unfortunately, our soil isn't the best, and a lot blows away each year.#$b#Say, could I interest you in one of my fertilizers?
Entries.21_2: Got a good deal on rent in our place. Helps that this town's pretty small.$h#$b#That does mean I don't get many customers, though.
Entries.22_2: Joja squeezes their suppliers hard. One of the reasons why they can have such low prices.
Entries.24_2: We moved to Pelican Town after we had Caroline. The place we were living in before...it wasn't a good place to raise children. And we couldn't afford better.
Entries.26_2: It's almost the end of the season, @. Got an idea of what you'll be planting next?
Entries.28_2: Ugh, it's my turn to cook dinner tonight....#$b#Maybe I'll just defrost some of these frozen quiche we've just started carrying...

Entries.3_2: It's a lot easier to run this shop without Joja open.$h
Entries.4_2: That Joja shop also was a fulfillment center for online orders. One of the reasons why they built that there, we're in a good spot to supply both Zuzu City and %place.#$b#Our rent is pretty cheap too.
Entries.7_2: I wonder if Abigail would be better off with a different major? She doesn't really like her current one.$s

Entries.3_2: Everything's harder when the economy goes bad like this.#$b#Government'll bail out the big guys and there's welfare payments for the poor, but people like me get squeezed.
Entries.5_2: My suppliers want to raise their prices...#$b#I can't pass on price increases though...
Entries.7_2: Before I moved to Pelican Town? I was a night manager at a gas station in Zuzu City.#$e#Dangerous work, and definitely a young man's job.#$b#I hated having to work nights. It takes more out of you than what most people expect.$s
Entries.9_2: I met Caroline when she was in college and I was working nights at a little grocery store.#$b#Working for Joja let me save up enough money to buy this place...
Entries.10_2: I wonder if I should push Abigail a bit more...#$b#That probably won't do much good, though.
Entries.11_2: Ugh, the prices of everything's going up, especially fuel.$s
Entries.12_2: @, I'm trying my best not to pass on price increases at the moment, but it's hard, it's really hard.$s
Entries.13_2: My worst nightmare would be losing this store.#$b#All our savings are tied up in this place. If it goes under we're done for.
Entries.15_2: I used to be an amateur boxer, back when we lived in Zuzu City.#$b#Was great fun, never made much money from it.#$b#Kept me in excellent shape though. My left hook is still pretty good.
Entries.17_2: Maybe I should take Caroline out for dinner.She'll probably like {{i18n:restaurant.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06}} }}, right?
Entries.18_2: Heya @, got any nice produce to sell to me?

Entries.3_2: I grew up poor, @, and I wouldn't wish that on anyone.
Entries.5_2: Maybe I should carry more boxed meals? They're certainly more convenient than cooking...
Entries.7_2: I know Caroline would like it if I cooked more often. But I'm always so busy with the store.#$b#I do the dishes for her, though, when it's not Abigail's turn to do them.
Entries.9_2: Ugh, I think the store has a leak. I'm not very handy, so we're probably gonna have to get Robin to take a look at it.
Entries.17_2: I suspect we have a leak in the ceiling.#$b#Between you and I, @, I'm not good at dealing with things like this.#$e#Guess I should get Robin to look at my roof...
Entries.19_2: @, I just want you to know, you'll never find better seeds that the ones I sell. Never.
Entries.21_2: #$c .9#Have you considered buying any of my fertilizers?#Heyyy, @, have you considered buying any of my fertilizers? Here's a free sample![368]

Entries.15_2: You know, @, maybe I should carry a more limited selection of items. Just things guaranteed to turn a profit.$s

Entries.1_2: @! Don't be afraid to let me know if there's something else you think I should carry!
